item.title: eMAPT Exam Review
item.description: eLearn Security Mobile Application Penetration Tester (eMAPT) is a mobile application penetration testing certification by INE (formerly known as eLearnSecurity).

item.title: eCPPT Exam Review
item.description: eLearn Security Certified Professional Penetration Tester (eCPPT) is a Network penetration testing certification by INE (formerly known as eLearnSecurity).

item.title: Bypass square - Web - NaScon'23
item.description: Bypass two preg_match functions to get the flag.

item.title: TryHackMe Cmess machine Walkthrough
item.description: Cmess is a Linux machine which contains exposed passwords, no restriction on file upload and a crontab privilege escalation.

item.title: Qualifier Web security (El Banco Amarillo) - CyberHackathon'23
item.description: The web security challenge was vulnerable to race condition. The following was the given website. The following were the user details with IDs and funds. the /dump path has a comment, which reveals the source code. The following part of the code was vulnerable to Race Condition. A race window exists in the if condition. We can send multiple request parallelly, it will bypass the if condition before the deduction of funds.

item.title: HackTheBox Lame Machine WriteUps
item.description: A beginner track machine from HackTheBox

item.title: Qualifier Network Security (Warmy) - CyberHackathon'23
item.description: A pcap file was being given for analysis. The pcap file was being opened in the wireshark. I applied the http filter to filter only http requests. There was a zip file that was retrieved through http protocol. There was nothing interesting in this zip file. I moved on, and i found that many requests were being made to the /f_data/data endpoint. All the requests were giving 403 forbidden response except the last one, which gave 200 OK response.

item.title: CEH Exam Review
item.description: CEH Practical is a certification program offered by the EC-Council. CEH certification is designed to validate the skills and knowledge of individuals who work in the field of cybersecurity.
